about.details:
Incorporated in 2009, Shera Energy Limited is engaged in the business of manufacturing winding wires and strips. The products are made of non-ferrous metals primarily Copper and Aluminium. Alongside, they also process products like wire rods, wires, and tubes of Copper and Brass.

They undertake the manufacturing based on the requirements of the customers, therefore they are customized to suit their customers. Briefly, Shera Energy produces products like Paper covered wires, Enamel and fiber covered wires, Round wires, Rectangular wires, Bunched wires, Tubes, Rods and Strips.

Shera Energy Limited is an ISO 9001:2015, ISO 14001:2015, and ISO 45001:2018 certified company. It has received Vendor Approval Validation from Power Grid Corporation of India for various products. All of the products designed and manufactured by the entity are tested and certified by the National Test House and Electrical Research and Development Association on various parameters to ensure supreme quality.

Competitive Strengths:

  • Strong, experienced, and dedicated senior management team and qualified workforce
  • Long-standing relationships with leading clientele
  • Focus on Quality and Safety
  • Established Manufacturing facility
  • Innovative Ideas

faqs.question: What is the Shera Energy IPO?
faqs.answer:
Shera Energy IPO is a SME IPO of 6176000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹35.20 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹57 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on February 7, 2023, and closes on February 9, 2023.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Shera Energy IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Shera Energy IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Shera Energy IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Shera Energy IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Shera Energy IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.answer: Shera Energy IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,14,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Shera Energy IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Shera Energy IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Shera Energy IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Shera Energy IPO will be done on Tuesday, February 14, 2023, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, February 16, 2023. Check the Shera Energy IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Shera Energy IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Shera Energy IPO listing date is on Friday, February 17, 2023.
